title: Utterly Disappointed
review:
False representation of the product. This is an i7 4770 processor and not a 5th gen i7. 
Flipkart did nothing when intimated on this issue. I have been lied to from day 1, and all the return policies stand null and void since this purchase was based on a null and void contract.

title: The best...!!
review: This is one of the best gadget... You should have...!

title: Good but nothing fancy
review: I m using it now for 8 months. This heavier than 13 inch one and also battery backup is horrible.

title: for web developers
review: Great product , the only macbook pro worth buying for a web developer. It still has usb ports.

title: Must buy!
review: It's little heavier but this is a powerful machine for coding and graphics. Happy with performance 👍

title: Terrific purchase
review: Finally it's a MacBook, Apple Amazing Experience Is Coming.

title: Mac pro
review: Apple Mac Pro is awesome. I have been using this lap for past one week. I luv it :)

title: My first Mac
review: So far so good , very first Mac ! Will take some time with it ..

title: Horrible
review: Flipkart canceled at the last moment. What a boat load of cheats...
